mapper.select: SELECT o.OWNER_SEQ ,s.STORE_SEQ ,s.STORE_NAME FROM OWNER o INNER JOIN STORE s ON o.OWNER_SEQ =s.OWNER_SEQ AND o.OWNER_SEQ =#{owner_seq}

SELECT (sum(o.PAY_PRICE)-sum(o.DELIVERY_TIP)) AS daily_sales ,o.STORE_SEQ ,(SELECT store_name FROM STORE s WHERE s.STORE_SEQ=${store_seq}) AS store_name ,count(*) AS daily_order_cnt FROM ORDERS o WHERE o.STORE_SEQ =${store_seq} AND o.ORDER_DATE BETWEEN TO_TIMESTAMP('${now} 00.00.00','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') and TO_TIMESTAMP('${now} 23.59.59','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') GROUP BY o.STORE_SEQ
SELECT o.OWNER_SEQ FROM OWNER o INNER JOIN ACCOUNT a ON o.ACC_SEQ =a.ACC_SEQ WHERE a.ACC_SEQ =#{acc_seq}
SELECT * FROM DD_SALES ds WHERE DAILY_DATE >= ${startDate} AND DAILY_DATE <= ${endDate} AND STORE_SEQ =${store_seq}
SELECT DAILY_ORDER_CNT FROM DD_SALES WHERE STORE_SEQ =${storeSeq} AND DAILY_DATE = TO_CHAR((sysdate-1),'YYYYMMDD')
